validation.message: Must be a valid email address

entry.value: // Enter JQuery command here. The event object is passed in as "ev"
// Enter JQuery command here. The event object is passed in as "ev"

[{"style":"","text":"The user name or login that uniquely identifies the user.","controlId":"rapid_P16_C72_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"A longer description of the user. Typically their full name.","controlId":"rapid_P16_C73_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P16_C74_","text":"The email address will be used to send the user any notifications, or for password resets.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"A password for this user.","controlId":"rapid_P16_C75_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P16_C76_","text":"If entered will only allow access to the user from the specified device. Use any of IP, NAME, AGENT, MAC, IMEI, IMSI, SIMNO. Multiple conditions can be separated with commas, and multiple rules with semi-colons. The * wildcard is also allowed.
For example AGENT=RapidMobile,IMEI=123456;IP=10* means that the user must be using the Rapid Mobile client with device IMEI 123456, or have an IP address starting with 10.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"Tick to allow user access to Rapid Admin. To manage a specific application in Rapid Admin this user will also need the RapidAdmin role for the application.","controlId":"rapid_P16_C77_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P16_C119_","text":"Tick to allow this user admin rights to all applications","type":"hover"},{"style":"","text":"Tick to allow user access to Rapid Design. To modify a specific application in Rapid Design this user will also need the RapidDesign role for the application.","controlId":"rapid_P16_C78_","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P16_C79_","text":"Tick to allow user access to limited set of functionality in Rapid Admin to manage application users. To manage users for a specific application this user will also need the RapidAdmin role for the application.","type":"hover"},{"style":"","controlId":"rapid_P16_C101_","text":"If selected then the account is locked and the user will not be able to log in","type":"hover"}]
